question: Which union ministry has decided to organize Shehri Samridhi Utsav?
option1: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
option2: Ministry of Women and Child Development
option3: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs has decided to organize an event named Shehri Samridhi Utsav from 1st -15th February 2019 all over the country focusing on urban livelihoods. The purpose of the event is to    extend the outreach of Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Urban Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NULM) to the poorest of  poor and the most vulnerable.
